Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Loomis
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 75th, Racine, 74th, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 74th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 74th, Ashland, 75th, Racine, 74th, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 74th/Loomis.

Allow extra travel time.
